_description: The four advents of Christ — two couplets in a sermon

CULKk424.Transcription:
In maydenes bresteIn mannys soule for resteTo hel payne to
                        slakeEt venit in to þis world a dome to take
CULKk424.Editions:
Wenzel,  Siegfried. 
             Preachers, Poets and the English Lyric.
         Princeton: Princeton Univ. Press, 1986: 91.
